name: Laser Scope
desc: Critical Strikes deal an additional 100% damage (+100% per stack) .
notes:
The Laser Scope is an item in Risk of Rain 2, added in the Survivors of the Void expansion. 
The holder's critical strike damage bonus is increased by 100% (+100% per stack). For example, if the player has one Laser Scope, their critical strikes would deal 3 times the damage of a regular attack, instead of 2 times as much.


== Notes ==
Since   Railgunner's critical strike damage increases based on her critical strike chance, this item is equivalent to picking up 10  Lens-Maker's Glasses while playing as her.
When the holder lands a critical strike, a glowing red crosshair appears over the struck enemy for a moment.
